snippet: President Goodluck Jonathan on Wednesday sought approval from Parliament to borrow up to $1 billion abroad to help the armed forces tackle the security threat posed by the Islamist insurgent group Boko Haram.
lead_paragraph: President Goodluck Jonathan on Wednesday sought approval from Parliament to borrow up to $1 billion abroad to help the armed forces tackle the security threat posed by the Islamist insurgent group Boko Haram.
